name: Ascend (muclem)
description:
"Knowledge is power" said Sir Francis Bacon, was he right?

Will you find the Eternal Fire? Will you uncover the cheesy secrets of this world?

Ascend is a relaxing puzzle game set in a quiet forest where you solve riddles.

Around 20 minutes of gameplay for now.

Controls are WASD to move and left-click to grab

Please take the time to come back and rate the game when you have finished it :)
